live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
61265.summary: Some customers in the Intercity area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
61265.title: May 16 - Thunder Bay (Intercity) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
